thread.title: Here's where you can get FREE PANCAKES in Manchester on Pancake Day
thread.title_full: Here's where you can get FREE PANCAKES in Manchester on Pancake Day

author: Emily Heward
title: Here's where you can get FREE PANCAKES in Manchester on Pancake Day
text:
Here's where you can get FREE PANCAKES in Manchester on Pancake Day Black Dog Ballroom and Common are both dishing out free pancakes on Shrove Tuesday, February 28 Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now How to make pancake art with Andrew Nutter Share this video Get What's On     
Pancake Day rolls back around next week and we can't flipping wait. 
Shrove Tuesday falls on February 28 this year, when kitchens everywhere will be a disaster zone of spilled flour and half-cooked batter stuck to the ceiling. 
Or, you could take yourself out for a stack and leave the cooking and the clean-up to the pros. 
Black Dog Ballroom's Northern Quarter and New Wakefield Street bars are both serving up FREE pancakes next Tuesday - all you have to do is buy a drink. Read More A pancakes and prosecco party is coming to Manchester for one week only Pancake eating competition at Black Dog Ballroom 
The NQ branch on Oldham Street is also hosting a pancake eating competition from 7pm, with the chance to win a Â£25 bar tab plus games of bowling and pool. 
Also in the Northern Quarter, Edge Street bar Common will be dishing up a free pancake with every drink you buy all day. Read More
